resources.string: Cutoff Frequencies for RC circuits. Passive filters are simple and cheap to make and provide easy frequency selectability. Capacitor Error bars are included to show unideal componants used.
This Activity helps identify unknown resistors by either prompting for the resistor value that is needed to be identified or by selecting the band colours to display the value
Define your own custom set of Resistors or Capacitors.Load up existing sets to dynamically add new componants to your existing set
Use a set of resistors to make a series resistor from two known parallel resistors or find the total resistance of two resistors in parallel

A collection of common circuits that is encountered such as Voltage Divider,Current Divider, Low Pass Filter,High Pass filters etc.

string-array.name: FilterPageItems
string-array.item: Active Low Pass Second Order Filter
Active High Pass Second Order Filter

resources.string: These filters are used over Passive filters as the output is independant of the load driven. The ratio of the resistors on the inverting output provides voltage gain of the filter

Active High pass filters are superior to passive filters but only up to 500khz. Generally they are made with capacitors but may also be constructed with inductors. Inductors tend not to be used to the size, cost and tend not to perform as well (Less ideal).
These filters are used over Passive filters as the output is independant of the load driven. The ratio of the resistors on the inverting output provides voltage gain of the filter
These filters are used over Passive filters as the output is independant of the load driven. The ratio of the resistors on the inverting output provides voltage gain of the filter
